Row.Text: +15% [ICON_Science] Science in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+15% [ICON_Science] Science in this city. Upon completion, grants a one-time [ICON_Science] Science boost equal to five times your current [ICON_Culture] Culture output. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards Space Race projects in your cities. Triggers the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka moment for the Satellites and Nuclear Fusion technologies upon completion. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Land units trained in this city start with a free promotion. Gain [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to 25% of the unit's cost when producing a non civilian unit in the city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+50% [ICON_Production] Production in this city when producing military units. Reduces maintenance cost of all units by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Land units trained in this city receive +100% Experience and have +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.
Your Holy Site districts get +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each building in the district. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points from Holy Site districts, +1 [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist points from Shrines, and +1 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points from Temples. [ICON_GreatWork_Religious] Religious Works of Art provide +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and all other Great Works created by [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artists provide +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Tourism from [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics and Holy Cities is not diminished by other civilizations who have researched the Enlightenment civic. Your Apostle units can choose from any possible promotions instead of receiving a random promotion. +30% [ICON_Faith] Faith in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Grants a free Trader unit in this city, and increases [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity by 1. Foreign [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to this city provide +6 [ICON_Gold] Gold to this city and the foreign city. +2 [ICON_Gold] to Bonus and Luxury resource tiles worked by this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+30% [ICON_Gold] Gold in this city. Upon completion, grants a one-time [ICON_Gold] Gold boost equal to five times your current income (before expenses). [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Districts in this city provide +1 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points of their type (+1 [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist and +1 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points from the Theater Square). Allows this city build one more district than the population limit allows. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.
Circus Maximus' [ICON_Amenities] Amenities are extended to each city center within 6 tiles. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.
+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in each city in your civilization. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

The Ironworks' [ICON_Production] Production is extended to each city center within 6 tiles. +1 [ICON_Production] Production to each strategic resourced worked by this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.
+30% [ICON_Production] Production in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

+30% [ICON_Culture] Culture in this city. Automatically themed when all [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work slots are filled. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

The International Airport's [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Production] Production are extended to each city center within 6 tiles. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism pressure from this city towards other civilizations in the Modern era or later. +25 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism in this Aerodrome district. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Each district in this city that generates [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points generates 1 additional [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer point. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Each district in this city that generates [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points generates 1 additional [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist point. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Each district in this city that generates [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points generates 1 additional [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician point. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]National Wonder. Only one copy of this building may be built in your civilization.

Replace.Text: Theming bonus increasing output by 50% when displaying [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] writings from different writers.
Theming bonus doubling output when displaying works from different artists.
